title: [1.12.2][Extra Foam For LiteLoader——Liteloader修复]
author: 九耀龙翔
txt_content:
本帖最后由 九耀龙翔 于 2020-3-11 13:45 编辑 

一个小mod，用来修复1.12.2 LiteLoader和其他mod导致崩溃
包括但不限于JEI、Ender IO、FastWorkbench、Diet Hopper、Inspirations
原文
Simple mod which fixes LiteLoader issues. Currently, it tackles the following:

Crashes with mods utilizing registry substitution (as documented here), as seen in the following issues:
http://develop.liteloader.com/liteloader/LiteLoader/issues/47
http://develop.liteloader.com/liteloader/LiteLoader/issues/50
http://develop.liteloader.com/liteloader/LiteLoader/issues/51
https://github.com/KnightMiner/Inspirations/issues/30
https://github.com/mezz/JustEnoughItems/issues/1288
https://github.com/Shadows-of-Fire/FastWorkbench/issues/4
https://github.com/SleepyTrousers/EnderIO/issues/4754
https://github.com/rwtema/DietHopper/issues/6
To use, just install the mod in a workspace with LiteLoader present.




2020-03-11_13.16.12.png (173.41 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-11 13:16 上传




没法截图啊
LiteLoader安装
推荐使用提取法，既从LiteLoader安装中提取liteloader-1.12.2-SNAPSHOT-release.jar，注入mods文件夹
下载地址
curseforge
